entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
